title: Rito why you force variety in new champ select
body:
we try to do a 4 man dynamic queue in ranked and we all agreed "we have to force the random to go support". so we fill all the other 4 roles across all 4 people and yet u don't let us start the game. that is so lame. we had:

Top/Mid
Jungler/Top
Mid/ADC
ADC/Top


that means across 8 roles for 4 players we have:

3 Tops
2 ADCs
2 Mid
1 Jungler


why do you do this to us. even if we take out a top and swap it for jungle we still cant start the queue.


The whole point of Dynamic Queue is to win at your best positions but ur not letting us do that and to make matters worse your forcing one of us to be stuck supporting as a secondary role which is not the best place for us to be.

At the same time you put the random in a role where he will feed, therefore our chances of losing go from 1% to 25%.

It shouldn't allow us to start if we don't have 4 roles filled out not when we do.


that is not cool and i expect a change to the new champ select.
